API_KEY: IEX Cloud public API token goes here
DATA_DIRECTORY: Absolute path to the data directory goes here; e.g. /Users/user/home/fundamentals-investing/data
LOG_DIRECTORY: Absolute path to the log directory goes here; e.g. /Users/user/home/fundamentals-investing/logs
PROJECT_DIRECTORY: Absolute path to the project directory goes here; e.g. /Users/user/home/fundamentals-investing
